mapper.insert: insert into t_e_contract_org ( org_id, org_third_party_user_id, org_creator, org_name, org_id_type, org_id_number, org_legal_id_number, org_legal_name, org_create_time, org_modify_time ) values ( #{orgId}, #{thirdPartyUserId}, #{creator}, #{name}, #{idType}, #{idNumber}, #{legalIdNumber}, #{legalName}, now(), now() )
